Introduction
This topic contains information on eligibility for VA benefits based on service in the Philippine Commonwealth Army, including
service of the Philippine Commonwealth Army in the United States Army
termination of service of the Philippine Commonwealth Army from the United States Army
benefit eligibility of
Veterans
, and
survivors
, and
benefit rates payable
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section B - Eligibility for Benefits Based on Philippines Service
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section B
